alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Tishomingo and Hardin Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Olive Hill to near Pickwick Landing State Park to near Pineflat. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Iuka, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Walnut Grove, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Olive Hill, Doskie, Hamburg, Phillips, Bruton Branch, Walkertown, Olivehill, Cerro Gordo, Red Sulphur Springs, Bacon Springs, Counce, Lowryville and Damon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
